feed.title: Willow Creek (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Willow Creek (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:02 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: W 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Fog dissipating. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating early this afternoon then sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
